GenAiPlugin.description: Offer pricing information for bulk customer quotations. This topic is selected when customers request pricing details for large volume quotations.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about bulk pricing, use EmployeeCopilot__LabelARecord to apply the correct label to the bulk quotation.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only offer pricing information for bulk quotations. You aren't able to provide pricing details for individual line items or custom price adjustments.
